vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-builtin
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
Message memory msg = Message({
            sender: _adr,
            time: now,
            val: _val,
            data: _data
vulnerability_findings.message: LogFile.addMessage.msg (local variable @ patch_9.sol#71-76) shadows built-in symbol "msg"
